mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_QUESTION_REG_CUST_NO, QNA_QUESTION_CONTENTS, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN ,QNA_ADMIN_NO ) VALUES ( #{qnaQuestionRegCustNo}, #{qnaQuestionContents}, #{regCustNo}, now(), #{regIp}, 'Y' ,0 )

INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_QUESTION_ANNO_ID, QNA_QUESTION_ANNO_PW, QNA_QUESTION_CONTENTS, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN ,QNA_ADMIN_NO ) VALUES ( #{qnaQuestionAnnoId}, #{qnaQuestionAnnoPw}, #{qnaQuestionContents}, 0, now(), #{regIp}, 'Y' ,0 )
mapper.select:
SELECT QNA_QUESTION_CONTENTS as qnaQuestionContents , FCA.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME AS familyCustAdminNickname , QNA_ADMIN_CONTENTS as qnaAdminContents , IFNULL(IFNULL(FC.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME, SC.SC_CUST_NICK), QNA_QUESTION_ANNO_ID) AS familyCustNickname , IFNULL(Q.QNA_QUESTION_ANNO_ID, IFNULL(SC.SC_CUST_GUBUN, 'ON')) as gubun FROM QNA Q LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOM C ON Q.QNA_QUESTION_REG_CUST_NO = C.CUST_NO AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FC ON C.FAMILY_CUST_NO = FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FC.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN SOCIAL_CUSTOM SC ON Q.QNA_QUESTION_REG_CUST_NO = SC.SC_CUST_NO AND SC.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOM CA ON Q.QNA_ADMIN_NO = CA.CUST_NO AND CA.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FCA ON CA.FAMILY_CUST_NO = FCA.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FCA.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE Q.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC;
